forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
